T02D2072:157b-1: krishna pi sh'a tsi s'a dha nam /
T02D2072:157b-3: sha za nag po'i sgrub thabs /
T02D2072:157b-4: na ma:krishna pi sh'a tsa ye sa ra sa ra sa sarba aarban me sv'a h'a /
T02D2072:157b-6: tshes drug nas brtsams nas zan lhag ma'i rdog po
T02D2072:157b-7: spangs dang ldan pa la lan nyer gcig bzlas nas
T02D2072:157b-8: mtshan mo 'dre de la dbul lo //
T02D2072:157b-9: zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig nas nyi ma re re don re ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2072:157b-10: de dag thams cad zad par bya'o //
T02D2072:157b-12: cho ga la sogs pas mnyes par byas na las gzhan yang byed do zhes so //
